page.title: 16CLUBS:AMBERLIGHTS MAJORETTES
page.content: THE{MAJORETTES TROUP AMBERLIGHTS CONSISTS OF APPROXIMATELY 25 GIRLS AGED BETWEEN 5 TO 15 YEARS. THIS TROUP PERFORMS{MARCHES, DANCES AND BATON {TWIRLING}TO{MUSIC. THEIR{LEADER}A{MACE}MARKS TIME WITH A TALL DECORATED{MACE}WHICH SHE THROWS UP IN THE AIR.EVERYONE CARRIES A SMALL THIN METAL{BATON}WITH{WHITE RUBBER ENDS TO{TWIRL. THERE ARE THREE{UNIFORMS}A{YELLOW {AND BLACK MILITARY DRESS WITH A BLACK {AND A SILVER HAT WITH FEATHERS,A GOLD {LEOTARD WITH BLACK SEQUIN DECORATIONS {AND A BLACK AND GOLD WINTER UNIFORM WITH{FUR CAPES, EARMUFFS AND MUFFS. THE TROUP HAS A FULL PROGRAMME OF COMPETITIONS AND DISPLAYS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.THEY LEAD THE{CHICKERELL {CARNIVAL PROCESSION. THE{MAJORETTES}TRAIN EVERY WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY 6.00pm TO 8.00pm
